description.narrative: 305/002 Social Mobilization and Communication strategy for social norm change developed and rolled out (*), which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 305 Violence against women and children prevented and mitigated
